auth.safeSpaceWaiting: Your safe space is waiting for you
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters

home.welcomeBack: Welcome back to your safe space
home.readyToShare: Ready to share what's on your mind? Your worries are valid, and you're not alone.
home.safeSpaceForWorries: A safe space for your worries
home.tagline: Worrybox helps you externalize your concerns, connect with supportive community members, and find peace of mind through shared understanding.
home.shareWorryDescription: Get it out of your head and onto paper. Sometimes that's all it takes.
home.communityFeedDescription: See how others are coping and offer support to those who need it.
home.noRecentActivity: No recent activity yet. Start by sharing your first worry!

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Track your journey and see how you're progressing
dashboard.startSharing: Start by sharing what's on your mind
dashboard.connectWithOthers: Connect with others to give and receive support
dashboard.shareWorriesToSeePatterns: Share a few worries to see your patterns and growth

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Stay connected with gentle check-ins and supportive messages from your Worrybox community.
notifications.gentleCheckIns: You'll receive gentle check-ins and supportive messages here
notifications.supportNotificationsDesc: Get notified about community support and interactions
notifications.checkInFrequencyDesc: How often would you like to receive gentle check-ins?
notifications.quietHoursDesc: Set times when you don't want to receive notifications

wellness.title: Wellness Center
wellness.subtitle: Discover guided exercises and coping techniques to help manage your worries and improve your mental wellbeing.
wellness.needHelpDesc: If you're feeling overwhelmed, try one of these quick techniques to help you feel better.

resources.title: Mental Health Resources
resources.subtitle: Find professional support, self-help tools, and community resources for mental health and wellbeing.
resources.noResourcesFound: No resources found matching your criteria.
resources.clearFiltersToSeeAll: Clear filters to see all resources
